alert.note: Alert for Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison County through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adair, or 8 miles west of Jackson, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Bemis, Adair, Westover, Roberts and Windy City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
